org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer

Class AbstractBeanQuery<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.AbstractBeanQuery<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Bean class.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Query

    public abstract class AbstractBeanQuery<T>
extends Object
implements Query
    Simple generics bean query implementation which dynamically injects missing query definition properties to CompositeItems.
    Author:
    Tommi S.E. Laukkanen

        Parameters:
        queryDefinition - QueryDefinition contains the query properties.
        queryConfiguration - Implementation specific configuration.
        sortPropertyIds - The properties participating in sort.
        sortStates - The ascending or descending state of sort properties.

        protected abstract List<T> loadBeans(int startIndex,
                int count)
        Loads a batch of beans.
        Parameters:
        startIndex - index of first bean to return in a batch,
        count - maximum number of beans in this batch.
        Returns:
        List of beans identified by startIndex and count.

      • saveItems

        public final void saveItems(List<com.vaadin.data.Item> addedItems,
             List<com.vaadin.data.Item> modifiedItems,
             List<com.vaadin.data.Item> removedItems)
        Saves the modifications done by container to the query result. Query will be discarded after changes have been saved and new query loaded so that changed items are sorted appropriately.
        Specified by:
        saveItems in interface Query
        Parameters:
        addedItems - Items to be inserted.
        modifiedItems - Items to be updated.
        removedItems - Items to be deleted.

      • saveBeans

        protected abstract void saveBeans(List<T> addedBeans,
             List<T> modifiedBeans,
             List<T> removedBeans)
        Saves the modifications done by container to the query result. Query will be discarded after changes have been saved and new query loaded so that changed items are sorted appropriately.
        Parameters:
        addedBeans - Beans to be inserted.
        modifiedBeans - Beans to be updated.
        removedBeans - Beans to be deleted.

      • deleteAllItems

        public final boolean deleteAllItems()
        Removes all items. Query will be discarded after delete all items has been called.
        Specified by:
        deleteAllItems in interface Query
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded or false in case of a failure.
